about_the_game:
Galaxy Rush is a sci-fi racing game that delivers the thrill of high-speed racing. Hop into a world where the most exhilarating Grand-Prix of the space age has begun, and the audience is waiting for a show. Gear up and start your engines, for the Galaxy Rush is about to blast off!

Spacecraft:

Step into the cockpits of 9 different spacecraft as you zip through different planets to claim victory for your own. Each craft reflects the driving preference of the racer, making no two spacecraft the same. Enjoy discovering different playstyles and mastering your favorites!

Environments:

Explore the galaxy as you boost your way through locations such as the sweeping corners of Neptune, the arid deserts of Mars, the neon metropolis of Earth, and the frozen peaks of Pluto!

Fun for All:

Gather a group of two to four friends to duke it out, or race solo against AI competition. Different gameplay modes allow you to create your ideal set of races.

Immersive Gameplay:

Featuring intricate and aesthetically rich visuals coupled with a diverse gaming experience, Galaxy Rush invites all kinds of players to have an experience that is out of this world.

Updates:

Our team is consistently working on adding new content to the game in the form of new gameplay areas, so stay tuned for more!

name: Galaxy Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 6 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Feel the thrill of galactic racing! The most exhilarating grand prix of the spacefaring age is upon us, and the audience is waiting for you. Gear up and start your engines, for the Galaxy Rush is about to blast off!
